item.description:
Enjoy a scenic Sunset Cruise around Lake Pocotopaug followed by Dinner on the Deck of Angelico's Restaurant.

We are getting a group of our friends together and taking a relaxing one hour narrated cruise around the lake with Hors Doeuvre served on board. Following our cruise, we will dine at the Lake House and enjoy the sunset over Lake Pocotopaug.

Come join us for a night of relaxation, good food and great company while summer is still riding high (I know, I know, it hasn't been much of a summer. That's why we need to squeeze out every minute that we can...lol) !!!

So, here are the details...

Sunday Night, August 9th

6:30pm Departure. Arrive at dock by 6:15pm

Dinner at 7:30

I MUST HAVE YOUR RSVP ON THIS MEETUP SITE IN ORDER TO GIVE THE RESTAURANT AN ACCURATE COUNT. SO PLEASE RSVP YES OR NO WHEN YOU MAKE YOUR DECISION. THANKS FOR YOUR ASSISTANCE.
SUNDAY NIGHT CRUISE


Available for individuals by reservation only

Cost of cruise and dinner is $45.00 per person (Plus tax and tip).$25.00 deposit due at time of reservation. The remainder at the dinner.



Your $45.00 payment INCLUDES:
1 hour narrated tour of Lake Pocotopaug.

Hors Doeuvres, soft drinks and waters served on boat.

Special Dinner menu served on Deck or on Porch of Angelico's Lake House Restaurant depending on weather.


COME ON OUT AND JOIN US!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be holding my Meetup sign!
item.name: Sunset Cruise around Lake Pocotopaug followed by Dinner on Angelico's Deck.!
